subject: Re: SimSon
description_text:
Hi,
 
For a longtime we have been trying to reach you several times via email, but unfortunately did not get a response. I hope you will not ignore my email and give me a short answer. 
 
We are immensely interested to work with you, so please give us business opportunities.
 
Looking forward to hearing from you.

MUHAMMAD FARHAN
SENIOR MERCHANDISER  

> On 22-Oct-2025, at 12:49 PM, wilsonglove85@icloud.com wrote:
> 
> Hi,
> 
> We are Wilson Impex, manufacturers of Karting Gloves, Sim Racing Gloves, Rib Protectors, and Neck Protectors, including FIA Homologation 2018 approved gloves.
> 
> Our products meet BSCI, Sedex, ISO, and CE standards, ensuring top quality for professional and amateur racers alike. We offer OEM, custom designs, and competitive bulk pricing.
> 
> Let’s connect to discuss how we can support your racing gear requirements.
> 
> Best regards,
> 
> Muhammad Farhan
> Senior Merchandiser
> Wilson Impex
> ? +92 52 3615050
> ✉️ wilsongloves85@icloud.com <mailto:wilsongloves85@icloud.com>
